original_text:
Hyenas will cry in its towers,
    and jackals in the pleasant palaces;
its time is close at hand
    and its days will not be prolonged.
korean_text: 그의 궁성에는 승냥이가 부르짖을 것이요 화려하던 궁전에는 들개가 울 것이라 그의 때가 가까우며 그의 날이 오래지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: Hyenas will cry in its towers,
and jackals in the pleasant palaces;
its time is close at hand
and its days will not be prolonged.
